About Me

Hi, I am Krish Lalwani, a 16-year old Full Stack Web developer based in India. I am coding since the age of 12 when i created my first WebPage. I usually deal with HTML, CSS and JavaScript. i am Computer Science student who loves to play with codes.
I am also certified in AI, deep Machine Learning and Python. I have developed more than 100 Advanced Python Projects which you can access on my GitHub. I also work with APP and Game development and also involved in CyberSecurity...
